overview.description: Biorhythm sample datasets for analysis and experimentation
overview.license: MIT License - Free for educational and commercial use
overview.scientific_disclaimer: Biorhythm theory is considered pseudoscience. Data provided for educational purposes only.

one_year_1990.description: One year of biorhythm data for person born 1990-05-15

two_years_1985.description: Two years of biorhythm data for person born 1985-03-22

quarterly_1995.description: 90 days of biorhythm data for person born 1995-08-10

five_years_1980.description: Five years of biorhythm data for person born 1980-12-25

multiple_people_2024.description: Comparative data for 3 people born in different months of 1990

metadata.cycles: Information about the three biorhythm cycles

timeseries.critical_days: List of critical day events (cycle zero crossings)

csv_format.critical_days: JSON array of critical day events

physical_cycle.description: Affects physical strength, endurance, and energy levels

emotional_cycle.description: Affects mood, creativity, and emotional sensitivity

intellectual_cycle.description: Affects mental acuity, logic, and reasoning ability

analysis_suggestions.descriptive_statistics: Calculate mean, std, min, max for each cycle
analysis_suggestions.seasonal_patterns: Look for monthly or weekly patterns
analysis_suggestions.trend_analysis: Examine long-term patterns using moving averages
